SEARCH
Package display.appointment

Class AppointmentDisplay

java.lang.Object
display.appointment.AppointmentDisplay
public class AppointmentDisplay extends Object
This class provides various methods for managing and displaying appointment-related information for doctors and patients. It includes functionality for approving or rejecting appointments, displaying appointment requests, viewing scheduled appointments, setting availability, and scheduling new appointments.

      Parameters:

    • scheduleAppointmentDisplay

      public static void scheduleAppointmentDisplay(Patient patient, String doctorId, String action, String appointmentID) throws utils.exceptions.PageBackException, utils.exceptions.ModelNotFoundException, utils.exceptions.ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Displays the scheduling menu for an appointment with a doctor.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient object scheduling the appointment
      doctorId - the unique identifier for the doctor
      action - the action to perform (e.g., new appointment or reschedule)
      appointmentID - the unique identifier for the appointment (if rescheduling)
      Throws:
      utils.exceptions.PageBackException - if the user chooses to go back
      utils.exceptions.ModelNotFoundException - if the doctor or appointment is not found
      utils.exceptions.ModelAlreadyExistsException - if there is a scheduling conflict

    • displayAppointmentAvailabilityForPatient

      doctor - the Doctor object whose availability is being viewed
